svg.text: Proving APR > Ollama > llama.cpp with falsifiable claims

g.text: KV heads < Query heads → 7:1 ratio for 0.5B · Reduces KV cache by 7×
With ZRAM (LZ4): 2.1× smaller → longer context in same VRAM
✓ = expected range · Red = optimization opportunity · renacer trace integration

svg.text: Falsifiable claims · Statistical rigor · Production-grade benchmarking
